webApp.name: BOOKING SYSTEM PROJECT
webApp.description: SmartTrend is a full-stack production-ready medical booking platform designed to facilitate medical tests and radiology bookings across multiple lab branches, including AlBorg, ElFa, First Lab, and Royal Lab centers. The platform allows patients to book tests and radiology services online, pay through integrated invoices (gateway), and select the nearest branch for sample collection. Branches can approve bookings online, manage patient services, and generate PDF invoices. Users can register accounts, view all past orders, choose payment methods (cash or card), and print receipts, making the entire medical booking and billing process seamless, automated, and traceable.
skills_Front: React Query for data fetching & caching
database: Relation modeling for user orders and branches
feature: Online booking for tests & radiology services
Online payments via integrated payment gateway by fawaterak
Online approval workflow for lab branches
Responsive design for web and mobile
webApp.role: I developed the platform end-to-end, including backend services, database design, API endpoints, frontend integration, payment integration, authentication, PDF generation, and real-time communication between users and lab branches.I implemented security best practices, efficient data handling, and optimized the system for production.

back.name: BOOKING SYSTEM PROJECT BACK-END
back.description: A production-ready backend API for an online medical diagnostics platform that allows patients to book lab tests and radiology services, submit online authorization requests, pay securely, and receive digital invoices and QR-coded confirmations.The system supports both online processing and in-branch verification, enabling patients to complete payment online and then visit any branch to finalize the service or collect results.The backend is built with Node.js, Express, and MongoDB, following a modular REST architecture with a strong focus on security, validation, and scalability.It includes secure authentication, Google OAuth login, session handling, real-time status updates via Socket.io, PDF invoice generation, email notifications, QR code validation, and administrative reporting tools.
skills_Back: PDF invoice generation using pdfkit & puppeteer
feature: Designed the system architecture and database models
Developed RESTful APIs for bookings, approvals, payments, and results
Implemented authentication, security middleware, and access control
Integrated digital invoicing, QR validation, and email notifications
Built real-time authorization status updates using Socket.io
Implemented admin tools for reports & analytics exports
back.role: Backend Developer — System Architecture & API Development
